exercises.title: Clean Starts
exercises.text: Slow is smooth; smooth is fast. A calm start creates a calm finish.

exercises.title: Even Tempo
exercises.text: Correct calmly; keep the line moving. Less tension, better control.

exercises.title: Light Hands
exercises.text: Quiet focus beats forced speed. Hold the rhythm through punctuation.

exercises.title: Light Hands
exercises.text: Stay with the next character only. When in doubt, slow down slightly.

exercises.title: Steady Rhythm
exercises.text: Let each keypress land, then move on. Less tension, better control.

exercises.title: Clean Starts
exercises.text: Keep your hands light. If you rush, you lose the pattern.

exercises.title: Light Hands
exercises.text: Smooth is repeatable. Precision is a feeling you can practice.
